TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_niqun, title = niqun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/niqun} }

S.FORM: niqun 'law balay niqun ta sraral, yan nqu ngahi, sehuy, trakis ru qulih Tayal, bizyoq rgyax, mit rgyax, para…kwara nnanu nniqun na rrgyax ga niqun ta. Zihung balay phapuy misu qaniy, minnuya nanak na ramat, qnayat nanak na ngta ru guru, ini szyay maniq qu llaqi misu qaniy, siki musa maniq pinhapuy na ttanux.

niqon 'law balay niqon ta sraral, yan nqo ngahi, sehoy, trakis ro qolih Tayal, bizyoq rgyax, mit rgyax, para…kwara nnano nniqon na rrgyax ga niqon ta. Zihong balay phapoy miso qaniy, minnoya nanak na ramat, qnayat nanak na ngta ro goro, ini szyay maniq qo llaqi miso qaniy, siki mosa maniq pinhapoy na ttanox.
